attributes.action: Beacon Zebra Crossing To Burnham Station from Littlebrook Avenue - Burnham Lane.
attributes.additional_details:
1. Slough Borough Council 13 Apr 2016 reference H140928.

3. Email to Anna Wright, Wright Anna <Anna.Wright@slough.gov.uk>
Sent: 03 September 2016.

3. Email to Paul Kelly and also marked Anna Wright. 
Sent: 23 October 2017 paul.kelly@slough.gov.uk
Subject: Dangerous - Very urgent Beacon light or Zebra Cross crossing from Littlebrook Avenue To Burnham Station.
attributes.background: 1000's of the residents - working ladies, men, school children, parents with prams, old people etc of Littlebrook Avenue and Britwell cross the busy road during peak hours via Littlebrook Avenue - Burnham Lane for access to Burnham Station.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Safety on local roads is the responsibility of your local council.

You can find out how to petition your council here: 

http://www.slough.gov.uk/moderngov/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx
